My services

Why choose Helveclick

For fast, high-performance and eco-responsible websites

I create lightweight websites that load quickly by avoiding the use of heavy frameworks or resource-intensive CMS. This optimizes the loading speed of your site while providing a smooth user experience. With an eco-designed approach, I ensure that each site respects the environment by optimizing energy consumption and reducing carbon footprint. I strive to stay as close as possible to the Green IT recommendations, to adopt responsible and sustainable practices at every stage of development.

For custom solutions, tailored to your specific needs

Each project is unique. Whether you need a showcase website, an online store, a mobile application, I design personalized solutions that specifically meet your needs. With an intuitive interface and adapted to your users, I ensure that every feature of the site is designed to maximize engagement of your visitors and convert prospects into customers.

For human and personalized support

Working with me means having the assurance of personalized support throughout your project. I listen carefully to you, I answer all your questions, and I'm available to discuss necessary adjustments at each stage. My approach is transparent, and I make it a point of honor to respect your deadlines and deliver impeccable quality.

For guaranteed quality

I am committed to delivering a robust final product, meticulously crafted down to the smallest detail, and designed to provide an optimal user experience. Every project is designed to be scalable and easily maintainable, in order to adapt sustainably to your future needs.

My values

Customer satisfaction

Your satisfaction is at the heart of my work. I’m committed to delivering a solution that fully meets your needs.

I remain available and attentive after delivery — to adjust, improve, or simply support you. My goal: a successful project built on trust.

Quality

I design reliable websites, built for smooth navigation, optimal performance, and accessible user experience. Each project is crafted with care to deliver a durable and truly tailored solution to your needs.

Eco-design

I believe the web can be more eco-friendly. That’s why I integrate sustainable web design into every project: reduced energy consumption, lightweight files, and green hosting. The result? A fast, efficient, and environmentally conscious digital solution.

  • Optimized images and files: Smart compression of images, videos, and resources for faster loading and lower energy usage.

  • Fewer requests, more efficiency: Minimizing server requests (CSS, JS, fonts...) to reduce data transfer and improve performance.

  • Green hosting: Partnering with providers that run on renewable energy and follow sustainable practices.

  • Clean code: Minimal and efficient development to reduce resource consumption and improve speed.

  • Thoughtful content: Fewer unnecessary animations, more simplicity—for a lighter, faster, and more accessible experience.

  • Mobile-first design: Built primarily for smartphones to save energy and deliver a smooth experience on all devices.

Transparency

I work with complete transparency: you're informed at every stage, from the budget to the technical choices. All decisions are made together, in a spirit of trust and clarity. My goal is to ensure honest, straightforward communication so you always feel confident and involved.

FAQ

Why choose eco-responsible web development?

An eco-responsible web development helps reduce energy footprint and maximize the efficiency of resources used. Each project is designed to be fast, light and optimized, thus reducing environmental impact. By choosing this approach, you contribute to a more sustainable development.

Why choose a freelance developer rather than an agency for your web project?

Choosing a freelance developer allows you to benefit from a direct relationship and more personalized. I am your single dedicated contact point, which guarantees greater responsiveness and flexibility. In addition, my rates are often more competitive than those of agencies, while offering custom solutions adapted to your specific needs.

What are the rates for custom web development?

Rates vary depending on the complexity and specifications of your project. I offer personalized quotes, transparent and detailed, adapted to your needs. Whether you need a simple showcase website or a complex web application, I commit to providing you with a fair quote without surprises.

Do you offer SEO services for my websites?

Yes, every project I develop includes basic optimization for natural referencing (SEO). From the design phase, I integrate SEO practices to guarantee you good visibility on search engines. I also ensure that your site is optimized for loading speed and user experience, two important factors for SEO.

What are the steps in the web development process?

The process is broken down into several key steps:

  • Analysis of your needs: I start by understanding your objectives to define the specifications of your project.
  • Design: Development of the site architecture and graphic charter, taking into account user experience.
  • Development: Creation of the site or application according to defined specifications.
  • Testing: Verification of performance, security and compatibility on different devices and browsers.
  • Launch and follow-up: Online deployment of the project after validation and final testing. I also offer follow-up and maintenance services to ensure that your site remains performant and secure in the long term.

What type of project can I entrust to a freelance developer like you?

I handle a wide range of web projects, including: creation of showcase websites, development of web and mobile applications, e-commerce solutions, custom platform development, API integration, and much more. If you have an idea in mind, I can transform it into a high-performance digital solution adapted to your specific objectives.
